title: Chilwell
author: Chilwell
content: My piple this question wen I ask dey confused me because goods and services just dey do up and down every day. Who go talk me how this redesign naira note go take be of help to us, When dey first started food stuff dey reduced I begin dey happy say this redesign na good thing but I con think of other commodity like cement, fertiliser, suger etc. Dey even dey increase in price, I con think say this thing no balance Because it suppose affect everything, if food dey reduce and fertiliser dey increase automatically the equation no balance, farmers will be at loss.I now ask the food seller y fud dey reduce price, they said na the rejection of old note and the new note wen no dey available that is reason for dat. So now watin be the advantage of this new redesign naira note.

comments.author: Belarge
comments.body: The redesigning of naira notes no get any advantage, politicians and CBN dey use this process dey play politics, no be the redesigning of naira notes be our problems for naija, no be say the value of the naira even add, no be the new naira notes even dey better than the old naira notes, so what is the need for the redesigning?The people wey dey at the top know the needs of the citizens but Dem know want attend to am, instead Dem dey go redesign naira notes wey don make people dey suffer, money scares everywhere, person go get money for bank en no go fit withdraw am, for my area now Dem no dey collect old notes again, and no be say we dey even see the new notes, Omoh the redesigning of naira notes no get any advantage at all.

comments.author: Broadanbig
comments.body: If I am not mistaken, I just think all these happened all of a sudden just to hold some people standstill at the detriment of the masses. As you can see for yourself, the election is fast approaching, there would be a massive withdrawal of money and in circulation. So the strategy was to change the naira note so that those that have already stashed it up will definitely return it back to the bank and face efcc or hide it and loose virtually all of it which is currently in play. I just have one feeling that this they have down is just to checkmate the activities of just one person to making sure they are frustrated and their funds all wasted.
